quotes.quote: “Power isn’t determined by your size, But the size of your heart and dreams!”
quotes.author: – Monkey D. Luffy

quotes.quote: “Every journey begins with a single step. We just have to have patience.”
quotes.author: – Milly Thompson

quotes.quote: “If your life can change once, your life can change again.”
quotes.author: – Sanae

quotes.quote: “If you just submit yourself to fate, then that’s the end of it.”
quotes.author: – Keiichi Maebara

quotes.quote: “Whatever you do, enjoy it to the fullest. That is the secret of life.”
quotes.author: – Rider

quotes.quote: “Sometimes I do feel like I’m a failure. Like there’s no hope for me. But even so, I’m not gonna give up. Ever!”
quotes.author: – Izuku Midoriya

quotes.quote: “Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.”
quotes.author: – Goku

quotes.quote: “There are no regrets. If one can be proud of one’s life, one should not wish for another chance”
quotes.author: – Saber

quotes.quote: “You can’t always hold on to the things that are important. By letting them go we gain something else.”
quotes.author: – Kunio Yaobi

quotes.quote: “If you don’t like your destiny, don’t accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.”
quotes.author: – Naruto Uzumaki

quotes.quote: “No matter how hard or impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal.”
quotes.author: – Monkey D Luffy

quotes.quote: “Fools who don’t respect the past are likely to repeat it.”
quotes.author: – Nico Robin
